messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We're in North Carolina
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Kelly! I didn t know there was such a group. I will check into it. Ann ... From: kbcdlovejo@aol.com To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Kelly!
I didn't know there was such a group.
I will check into it.
Ann
----- Original Message -----
From: kbcdlovejo@...
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 2004 11:53 AM
Subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We're in North Carolina


In a message dated 5/26/2004 11:49:24 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
hooperck@... writes:
I'm in NC too, where are you guys?
I'm in Western NC, though not quite in the mountains....more the foothills.
Ann<<<<

Robyn was here on the east coast for a wedding in Monroe, near Charlotte. She
came down to Columbia, SC and spent an hour or two visiting.

There's a huge unschooling group in NC----try NCUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com
Several members are in western NC. Great group.

~Kelly

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We're in North Carolina
messages.msgSnippet: It was a great visit - your house is so charming, and your vege garden is just like what I dream about. That really was the first time that Jayn has gone into
messages.messageBody:
It was a great visit - your house is so charming, and your vege garden is
just like what I dream about. That really was the first time that Jayn has
gone into such a long rap - up until then she has done about 4 lines at a
time. You were fortunate in that you got rhymes instead of everything
suddenly ending in "poo-poo!" - EG "The frog sat in the poopoo! inky dinky
stinky poo-poo! (giggle, giggle) Eeeyuh."

I'll be glad to talk to Cameron (hope I got the name right) anytime.

Robyn L. Coburn

<<We had a lovely, but very short, visit with Robyn and Jayn. Jayn's grown
up
so much since August!

And the girl can RHYME! <g>

I'm so sorry many of you all don't live closer to me! :-(

~Kelly>>

---

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] We're in North Carolina

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/22/2004 10:29:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dezigna@... writes:
I have unlimited miles on my rental car - perhaps I could come and
see the Lovejoys, if it is convenient.

Robyn L. Coburn<<<<

We had a lovely, but very short, visit with Robyn and Jayn. Jayn's grown up
so much since August!

And the girl can RHYME! <g>

I'm so sorry many of you all don't live closer to me! :-(

~Kelly

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/22/2004 10:29:29 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
dezigna@... writes:
Jayn and I am in Monroe, North Carolina for a wedding tomorrow, and
then I have a free day here on Monday. Return CA Tues am.

Anyone in the area want to meet up?

I'll check the board, then send you my cel phone number.

I have unlimited miles on my rental car - perhaps I could come and
see the Lovejoys, if it is convenient.

Robyn L. Coburn<<<

We'd LOVE to have you visit!

Just let me know. 803 776 4849

~Kelly

messages.subject: We're in North Carolina

messages.messageBody:
Jayn and I am in Monroe, North Carolina for a wedding tomorrow, and
then I have a free day here on Monday. Return CA Tues am.

Anyone in the area want to meet up?

I'll check the board, then send you my cel phone number.

I have unlimited miles on my rental car - perhaps I could come and
see the Lovejoys, if it is convenient.

Robyn L. Coburn
